app.name: WiiUFtpServer
app.short_description: A robust and optimized FTP server for the Wii-U!
app.long_description:
Based on FTP-everywhere server, this version fix :
- file injection failures (put rights on files), - display the right file timestamps when available, - transfers number (up to 8) and speeds, - add an optional CRC check of files transferred.
Get the crcChecker in the WiiUFtpServer app folder on the SDCard
